title: health check api returns service status and timestamp
description: Verify that the GET /health endpoint returns a 200 status code with a JSON body containing a status field with value 'ok' and a valid timestamp field in date-time format.

title: companies api create company with valid and invalid data
description: Test the POST /companies endpoint to create a new company with valid data resulting in a 201 response, and test with missing required fields or duplicate company name resulting in a 400 validation error.

title: companies api list companies with pagination and filtering
description: Verify the GET /companies endpoint returns a paginated list of companies, supports limit and offset query parameters, and filters companies by status when provided.

title: companies api get update and delete company by id
description: Test GET /companies/{id} returns company details for valid ID and 404 for invalid ID; PATCH /companies/{id} updates company fields and returns 200 or 404 if not found; DELETE /companies/{id} deletes the company and returns 200 or 404 if not found.

title: users api create user with valid and invalid data
description: Test POST /users to create a new user with valid email and name resulting in 201 response, and test with missing required fields or duplicate email resulting in 400 validation error.

title: users api list users with pagination and filters
description: Verify GET /users returns a paginated list of users, supports limit, offset, status, and company_id filters correctly.

title: users api update delete and get user related data
description: Test PATCH /users/{id} updates user data and returns 200 or 404 if user not found; DELETE /users/{id} deletes user and returns 200 or 404; GET /users/{id}/companies returns companies user belongs to or 404 if user not found; GET /users/{id}/audit-logs returns audit logs with pagination or 404 if user not found.

title: assets api create list update and delete assets
description: Test POST /assets creates asset with required fields and returns 201 or 400 for validation errors; GET /assets lists assets with pagination and filters; PATCH /assets/{id} updates asset and returns 200 or 404; DELETE /assets/{id} deletes asset and returns 200 or 404.

title: company access api manage user access to company
description: Verify GET /companies/{companyId}/users lists users with access or 404 if company not found; POST /companies/{companyId}/users grants access with valid data returning 201 or 400 for validation errors; DELETE /companies/{companyId}/users/{userId} revokes access returning 200 or 404 if access not found.

title: audit logs api list audit logs with filters
description: Test GET /audit-logs returns a paginated list of audit logs and supports filtering by entity_type and entity_id query parameters.
